Posts.Title: Tennessee Thread nelliebelle0361 jenny66

Posts.Content: Dec 28, 2007 07:58PM itslisalouwho wrote: haha...on the phone.  :)   Wasn't as bad as it sounds though.  I found the lump.  Went to my FD because he could see me sooner than my GYN.  He said it was nothing...not to worry.  But, he did send me for a Mammo because I was 40 and had never had one.  While there, they decided to do microviews.  Ten mins later, they decided to do US.  The tech left the room....and the Radiologist came in and told me that he didn't want to scare me....but, my US didn't look good.  That I would need to call my FD and get a biopsy soon.  When I called bright and early the next day.....the girl that answered my call knew me by name.  Knew why I was calling.  They already had the report.  I ask them if I could come by and get a copy of the report.  By reading it....I was 99% certain it was BC.  2 days later I had the biopsy, and 2 days after that, the nurse called me and told me that in fact, it was cancer.
